description: '''Cheerleader''' is an American [[indie pop]] band from [[Philadelphia]], Pennsylvania, United States.  Formed in 2012, the band signed in 2013 to Bright Antenna Records and have so far released a 7" single, "Perfect Vision"/"Waiting Waiting," in the United Kingdom, the ''On Your Side'' EP in the United States, an LP, ''[[The Sunshine of Your Youth]]'', released May 19, 2015, and a single, "Bang, Bang," in the United States, on May 30, 2019.
